add_sound.title: Add Sound
add_sound.prompt_placeholder: Describe the sound atmosphere, sound effects or desired music (e.g.: 'light wind and birds singing', 'epic music and explosion sounds', 'horse gallop on ground')...
add_sound.processing_time: Adding sound may take a few minutes.

errors.invalid_source: Source video is not loaded or is invalid.
errors.missing_prompt: Please enter a description for the sound.

add_sound.success: Sound addition has been started. Processing may take several minutes.

how_it_works.title: How it works
how_it_works.step1_desc: The page loads the video you selected.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Use a prompt to describe the audio to add to the video.
how_it_works.step3_desc: The generation of the new video with sound is started and may take a few minutes.

create_image.title: Create Image
create_image.description: Create an image using a text prompt.
create_image.prompt: Enter a text prompt to generate an image.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Your creations and generated images.
gallery.no_drawings: You don't have any saved drawings yet.
gallery.no_generated_images: You haven't generated any images yet.
gallery.login_required: Sign in to view your drawings.

metadata.title: yatubbb
metadata.description: Makes it easy to create and share AI-generated images and videos. You can create images from text, edit them, and even generate videos from images. The platform is user-friendly and offers a variety of tools to enhance your creative process.
